service.description: A service to create a refund in shopify through the payment screen "Gateway Refund" option. For this a payment gateway must be configured (Example in seed data)

return.message: This payment is not associated to an Order, aborting gateway refund
This order is not a Shopify Order, so a refund cannot be processed through this gateway
The order ${order.orderId} does not have a Shopify ID, aborting gateway refund
The product store where this payment was processed does not have a remote configured to proccess the refund
The response json has no refund object.

service-call.name: create#mantle.account.method.PaymentGatewayResponse
service-call.in-map: [paymentGatewayConfigId:'Shopify Payments', paymentOperationEnumId:'PgoRefund', paymentId:payment.paymentId, paymentMethodId:payment.paymentMethodId, amount:responseAmount, amountUomId:payment.amountUomId, referenceNum:response.refund.transactions.first().authorization, transactionDate:ec.user.nowTimestamp, resultSuccess:'Y', resultDeclined:'N', resultNsf:'N', resultBadExpire:'N', resultBadCardNumber:'N']
